channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A man chopped down Los Angeles trees. The crime cut deep in the struggling neighborhood

item.title: Republicans aim to pass Trump's big bill. And, Steve Bannon analyzes Trump's strategy
item.description: House Republicans are focused on passing Trump's "big beautiful bill" by Memorial Day. And, Steve Bannon shows support for Trump's agenda in an interv...

item.title: More and more older Americans want to know their Alzheimer's status, survey finds
item.description: A survey of 1700 Americans 45 and older found that 79% would want to know if they were in the early stages of Alzheimer's.

item.title: With a focus on unity, Vietnam celebrates 50 years since war's end

item.title: Private eye accused of hacking American climate activists loses UK extradition fight
item.description: The Justice Department has charged Amit Forlit with conspiracy to commit computer hacking, among other crimes.

item.title: Egg-free cooking tips from chef Chloe Coscarelli
item.description: With egg prices still high, chef Chloe Coscarelli shares pantry-friendly substitutes that make your favorite recipes just as delicious—no eggs require...

item.title: Iowa immigrant group is alarmed by a state lawmaker’s demand for confidential information
Taiwan condemns Somalia travel ban
item.description: Taiwanese are warned against traveling to Somalia or Somaliland for their own safety before the ban is lifted.

item.title: Marshall Allen honored with Jazz Masters Fellowship for lifetime of innovation

item.title: Missing South African police officers found dead in river after six days
item.description: It is unclear how they died - the police had referred to a possible kidnapping but now suggest an accident.

item.title: Immigrants working legally in the Texas Panhandle live in limbo under Trump’s crackdown
item.description: Confusion and fear are rippling through the immigrant communities of the Texas Panhandle, where newcomers have come for generations to work in its imm...

item.title: Stocks slide after GDP data shows sharp drop in U.S. economic growth
item.description: Stocks in the U.S. are sinking as investors digest data indicating the economy shrank 0.3% in the first quarter.

item.title: Israeli forces arrest prominent Palestinian journalist in West Bank
item.description: Ali al-Samoudi, who has worked extensively with Western media, was detained during what the Israeli military said were counter-terrorism raids.

item.title: Takeaways from AP’s report on how Trump’s immigration crackdown resonates in the Texas Panhandle
At least three deaths linked to massive Spain power cut
item.description: Authorities are investigating whether a family of three died in circumstances linked to Monday's major outage.

item.title: Malta's golden passport scheme breaks EU law, top court rules
item.description: The scheme lets people become citizens after paying, buying or renting property of a certain value, and donating to charity.
